guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
Eagle's subscriber count just dropped by about 89. Meanwhile, carpathianflorist and JosephGoebbels both lost about 5-9 subscribers each. (I don't know the exact counts. They're based on memory and the archives of their profiles on archive.org.)

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Eagle's subscriber count just dropped by about 89. Meanwhile, carpathianflorist and JosephGoebbels both lost about 5-9 subscribers each. (I don't know the exact counts. They're based on memory and the archives of their profiles on archive.org.)

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body:
I think through device, not IP.  
If my brother creates an account in the same house, it isn't my alt and I don't think it counts as one.

I think through device, not IP.
If my brother creates an account in the same house, it isn't my alt and I don't think it counts as one.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

body: A few days ago my rep went down by 100 for no reason. None of my posts or comments lost upvotes, it just happened. Does this have anything to do with it?

body: It's possible that accounts were banned that had upvoted your content. If that's the case, then those votes would not be counted the next time your content was scored.
body_html: It's possible that accounts were banned that had upvoted your content. If that's the case, then those votes would not be counted the next time your content was scored.
